title: 2010 FIFA World Cup South Africa
description: 2010 FIFA The South Africa World Cup is the 2010 world championship football tournament held in South Africa, the 19th global soccer tournament to be hosted by FIFA and the first-ever in Africa. The tournament takes place on qualified stadiums in South Africa from June 11 to July 11, 2010. The final match will be held at Soccer City Stadium in Johannesburg. That year, Spain was crowned champion for the first time after the intense final match, having to play until extra time. Spain has also been confirmed as the first European team to be crowned on the playground outside the continent, and the championship team scoring the least number of goals in 19 matches (8 goals). In the 2010 tournament there was another surprise, the Italian team at that time the defending champion was eliminated in the group stage. If including the qualifying round, this World round will compete with 204 national teams out of 208 FIFA members.

title: ATV Offroad Fury Pro
description: Alongside the release of ATV Offroad Fury 4, the offroad racing video game ATV Offroad Fury Pro was also made available to consumers. There is a range of other vehicles to race with, such as trucks or bikes, which is the foundation of the career mode: competing in a string of championships divided by vehicle type and difficulty. In addition to the typical ATVs (all-terrain vehicles), there are also a variety of other vehicles to compete with. Credits are used to buy upgrades and different cars, and they may be gained in various ways. In addition to prize money for winning races, credits are also granted for completing stunts, so there are multiple methods to earn them. Three sponsors give free upgrades and recognition in exchange for meeting their performance and stunt rating requirements. However, these sponsors should be recruited with extreme caution because a significant penalty is imposed on the player if their goals are unmet. The following categories of competitions are open to participants: Supercross, Rallycross, National, Freestyle, Circuit, Endurcross, Rally, and Snowcross.

title: Ace Combat X – Skies of Deception
description: The action flight series debuted on the PSP with the launch of Skies of Deception, the first game. The player is in charge of the Gryphus Squadron, one of the few units still active for the nation of Aurelia and its lone airbase. Aurelia is located on the southeastern edge of the Ocean Continent. In 2020, the neighboring country of Leasath, led by Diego Gaspar Navarro, launched an assault on the nation of Aurelia. They attacked because it was believed that Aurelia was implicated in assisting their adversaries during the civil war.

title: Assassin’s Creed – Bloodlines
description: Assassin’s Creed: Bloodlines is a game only available for the PSP. It is a continuation of the storyline from the first Assassin’s Creed game, and it also sets the stage for the events of the game’s sequel, Assassin’s Creed II. The original game’s open environment and nonlinear gameplay are both available in this spin-off for mobile and portable devices, in contrast to the Assassin’s Creed: Alta’r’s Chronicles mobile spin-off.

title: Ben 10 – Alien Force Vilgax Attacks
description: Vilgax still hasn’t given up on invading the Earth, this time using a device called a Null Void to support the plan. Ben and his teammates Gwen and Kevin must fight to protect the homeland. But in the battle with Psyphon, he used all the Omnitrix aliens to defeat it and consequently exhausted the watch’s power. The opportunity to maneuver and Vilgax even more narrowly captured the earth. To end this story is only one way, in the end, is shifted to the past to stop Vilgax plan before it takes place. Once again, the fate of man is on Ben’s shoulder.

title: Ben 10 – Protector of Earth
description:
During a trip through the night near the Grand Canyon, Ben did not know that when their sleep was a strange creature like mosquitoes drained of energy, just enough to make him turn into some alien was Four Arms and Heatblast. Ben was awakened by a loud noise outside so he decided to go outside to check and discovered that the alien device named Omnitrix crashed into the Grand Canyon and the Drone was raging here. After Ben clears the robots, he battles a giant boss and ends the battle with the help of a crystal.
Thanks to his grandfather Max and Gwen, Ben knows that this crystal will help him recover energy and after absorbing the crystal, he can turn into XLR8 and ready to break the plans of the enemies ahead.

title: Ben 10 – Ultimate Alien – Cosmic Destruction
description:
During a fight with Forever Knight in a crypt in Rome, Ben suddenly separated from his friend Gwen and Kevin-2. He unexpectedly met Enoch, who gained power from an artifact of aliens. After defeating him, he took the object off Enoch’s body when he suddenly turned into a stone statue. Later, when he was picked up by his friends, he was warned by Jimmy about a cosmic storm approaching the Earth. The group traveled to France to fight to a raging creature, and when they arrived at the Forever Knight Museum, Ben saw the Vreedle Brothers trying to steal an alien artifact. Despite defeating him, Sunder was taking antiques when no one noticed. Ben’s wars were not over.
Ben 10- Ultimate Alien-Cosmic Destruction is a role-playing action game where players will incarnate into a character to fight the enemy. You will not be required to use the character Ben, but instead, the publisher has provided us with 16 heroes such as Ultimate Big Chill, Ultimate Spidermonkey, Ultimate Echo Echo, Ultimate Swampfire, Ultimate Humungousaur,…As you can see, the player has a relatively diverse selection of characters. These heroes are also carefully cared for by the manufacturer, such as tunneling, shooting water rays, releasing radiation, firing electricity, selecting, attacking with wind power, and many other attributes. At the end of a match, you will have some bonus points to be able to upgrade the qualities and skills of the character. The game also has a vast improvement that is the Quick Switch feature helps players can transform the shapes of aliens at a dizzying speed. This switching ability will also bring more diversity to the game because, in a match, you will have to switch states that continue to be able to match the opponent’s attacks. The rhythm of the game will not be too fast. A unique feature of this game is some new alien heroes that have never been before, such as Water Hazard, Armodrillo, AmpFibian, Terrapin. This may appeal to those who are familiar with the old characters.

title: BlazBlue – Continuum Shift II
description: The game takes place after the events of BlazBlue: Calamity Trigger. Several days have passed since the raid reported by Ragna the Bloodedge. The 13th Hierarchical City of Kagutsuchi forgot to hold a New Year’s Eve ceremony due to his allegations related to the mysterious bombing and the sight of a giant star became a hotly debated topic for people in town. with the NOL has not given the plausible explanation, people in the city have made their own assumptions, exaggerated and spread those rumors like wildfire. Completely unconcerned about what happened, Ragna gripped the sword silently, waiting for the chance to achieve her true goal, and at last the great power that appeared to make Ragna begin to act.
publisher: JP: Arc System Works/ NA: Aksys Games/ EU: Arc System Works UK

title: Bleach – Heat the Soul 7
description: Since childhood, Kurosaki Ichigo has been a special teenager capable of seeing spirits. Still, he tried to live a normal life like everyone else. Until he studies at Ichigo High school, he accidentally meets Rukia – a Shinigami (death god) who is on a mission to find the lost Hollow in the extremely dangerous human world. Ichigo’s life officially turns to a new page when Rukia because of protecting him but is seriously injured, she is forced to give Ichigo half of his strength but he takes almost all of her strength and turns into a Shinigami, and defeat Hollow easily. But because of that, Rukia was forced to stay in the human world until she recovered her energy. This was against the rules of the Shinigami, so Rukia was sentenced to death. Ichigo and his friends save Rukia and decide to go to hell to bring her back. From here, the young hero faces challenges and adventures rotating between hell – earth, fierce battles and new enemies forcing him to overcome.

title: Bomberman
description: The port of Bomberman to the PSP features the original gameplay, along with many levels and various items, all depicted in full 3D. White Bomberman has returned and is more determined than ever to rid the known worlds of the darkness that has plagued them. After eradicating the night from each planet, you will be transported to the next one, which will have a variety of environments, such as a desert (with sand pits that act as portals), snow (with ice blocks that you can slide through), fire (with perilous volcanic and otherwise unstable levels), and other environments.

title: Bomberman Land
description: In the past, White has stopped bad guys from sabotaging the amusement park in Bomberman Land. Of cousBut recently, even without any warning, the properties have been stolen by someone. The director has contacted the Bomber hero and hopes to receive his help once more. As White, you will start the game with story mode and the mission to collect buildings, to restore the splendor of the amusement park. Developer Hudson has shown that their product does not have a lot of verbose text, but it is understandable for any newbie. Although the level can be replayed, there is still a certain attraction, making it difficult for players to separate leave your PSP device. With the mechanism of dropping bombs, breaking obstacles and killing enemies to win, the game is a good game to play in free time. There are also a number of other options, such as a mode to compete with friends and minigames. They also contribute to creating the experience of this game, which requires more ingenuity, reflexes, and observation. Some of the highlights that I know of are Chu Chu Rocket, Bomb Factory, and Log Logic. Pass some specific stages to unlock more.
publisher: JP: Hudson Soft/ NA: Konami/ EU: Rising Star Games

title: Burnout Dominator
description: The PlayStation 2 and PlayStation Portable gaming devices are supported by the latest entry in the Burnout video game series, which is called Burnout Dominator.

title: Burnout Legends
description: The first installment in the Burnout series for handheld consoles combines the best elements of the original three games: Burnout, Burnout 2: Point of Impact, and Burnout 3: Takedown. Burnout Legends’ main draw is still aggressive racing, and the player’s aim is to win races and to wreck opponent cars as much as possible. Burnout Points are awarded for opponent takedowns, drifts, and other tricks, which unlock new vehicles and other awards.

title: Call of Duty – Roads to Victory
description: The first installment in the Call of Duty series to be released for the PlayStation Portable is titled “Roads to Victory.” Because it is based on the PS2 version of Call of Duty 3, many mission maps have been lifted from there and modified to include additional objectives and other alterations.

title: Cars
description: Race to the finish line and experience all the fun and excitement of Cars, the next movie from Pixar Animation Studios and Walt Disney Pictures. Help Lightning McQueen win the coveted Piston Cup Championship by taking on the roles of all your favorite characters. Film Synopsis Cars is the seventh animated movie made by Pixar Animation Studios and put out by Walt Disney Pictures. Toy Story, A Bug’s Life, and Toy Story 2 were all directed by Pixar’s John Lasseter, who has won two Academy Awards. Owen Wilson, Paul Newman, and Bonnie Hunt all lend their voices to the characters in Cars, a high-octane adventure comedy with many cars that get their kicks on Route 66. Darla K. Anderson is in charge of making Cars, and she also made A Bug’s Life and Monsters, Inc.

title: Castlevania – The Dracula X Chronicles
description: The first Castlevania game, Rondo of Blood, was remade into the video game Castlevania: The Dracula X Chronicles. While the graphics have been updated to be in 3D, the gameplay remains relatively consistent with the 2D platforming style of the original. Additionally, it includes a Boss Rush mode that, once finished three times, allows the player to unlock a minigame.

title: Coded Arms
description: The PlayStation Portable video game Coded Arms is a first-person shooter. You take on the role of a hacker from the future who employs various technologies to connect his brain to various computer networks. The entirety of the game takes place in a computer network that simulates a virtual reality environment. This planet was designed to be a battle training ground for an extraterrestrial invasion. Even after the program was taken off the air, it continued to work usually and expanded throughout the network. To destabilize the world, you infiltrate it.

title: Crash Tag Team Racing
description: When Ebeneezer von Clutch, the proprietor of the famous racetrack amusement park MotorWorld, has the Black Power Gem that sustains his life force stolen, he tasks Crash and his allies (as well as his enemies) with retrieving the gem and locating the person responsible for its theft.

title: Crash of the Titans
description: The DS and Game Boy Advance versions of this game are not the same as this one. The plot of the story involves Crash’s most sworn enemies, Neo and Nina Cortex, developing a machine that transforms the animals that live on Crash’s island into monstrosities and poses a threat to the life of people who live on the tranquil island. Crash must end them by “hijacking” these monsters and using their power to combat the strength of the Cortexes.

title: Crash – Mind Over Mutant
description: In Crash Bandicoot: Mind Over Mutant, a revived Neo Cortex is taking over the world one brain at a time. Cortex and N. Brio develop a new kind of Evil: a texting device that can do anything and control the minds of both mutants and bandicoots. With his quick mind and lightning-fast reflexes, Crash must save the day by freeing his friends, the titans.

title: Crazy Taxi – Fare Wars
description: Crazy Taxi for the PSP is a compilation of the original two games, complete with all-new features.

title: Crisis Core – Final Fantasy VII
description: The prequel Crisis Core, set six years before the 1997 PSX game Final Fantasy VII, follows the experiences of Zack Fair as he finds the truth about the organization he works for, Shin-Ra. Cloud Strife is still a Shinra Guard during the time, and Aerith Gainsborough appears as well. Other notable characters include Sephiroth, Tifa, Yuffie, Cait Sith, members of the Turks gang, and characters from Dirge of Cerberus.

title: Dante’s Inferno
description: Dante’s Inferno is an action-packed voyage through the land of Inferno based on Dante Alighieri’s first canticle of Divine Comedy. Dante is re-imagined in this adaptation as a templar knight, a veteran of the Crusades, who returns home to find his beloved Beatrice murdered. The murderer then stabs Dante in the back as well. On the other hand, Dante Caneath wishes to take him down to hell and robs him of his scythe. With his new abilities, he may descend into the Inferno to find Beatrice, whose soul has been taken by the devil. Lucifer intends to marry her soul, which should have gone to heaven instead, to escape torment and overthrow God. To avoid this, Dante must go through the nine circles of hell and master their demons before facing his ultimate challenge. To liberate Beatrice, he must confront his history, crimes, and sins in keeping with the initial subject of acknowledging and rejecting evil. Throughout his travels, he frequently encounters the poet Virgil, who describes the many circles and draws flashbacks that show how Dante sinned in each process during the Crusades.

title: Daxter
description: Daxter makes his solo debut in this action-platformer, revealing how he became a hero and freed Jak at the start of Jak II. Finally free to leave Haven City, Daxter unwittingly takes a job as a pest exterminator, a job the Old Sage intuitively knew he was good at since the first Jak and Daxter. Armed with a fly swatter and, soon later, a spray canister that allows him to stun bugs and float in the air, Daxter explains the introduction of the imminent invasion that occurred in Jak II into Haven City to the player. The attack is commanded by the Metal Heads, who use bug-like versions known as Metal Bugs to infiltrate the city. Later improvements include a flame thrower attachment and a detonation weapon.

title: Dead Head Fred
description: An action game called Dead Head Fred depicts a “classic tale of murder, corruption, and revenge and… interchangeable heads,” according to the game’s description. Fred Neuman is the primary protagonist of the story. In the community of Hope Falls, he works as a private investigator. During his investigations, he becomes excessively involved with the operations of the mob, leading to his being tricked into a trap and ultimately decapitated. Shortly after his assassination, he is discovered by Dr. Friedrich Steiner, who resurrects his body and places his brain and eyes in a jar. This occurs shortly after his murder. The path that Fred will take to exact his vengeance starts right here.

title: Dead or Alive Paradise
description: The game is primarily related to beach activities. For the sexy female characters, your vacation has 2 weeks starting at New Zack Island. Your work is to choose 1 favorite character among 9 characters to join the game. In particular, you can chat, flirt, socialize, snapshots with other people and challenge them in the mini-game on the island. However, if you want to have fun, you have to search for yourself, everything is not available. Store snaps in your unique album with the ‘venus clip’ effect to view and edit or share intimate experiences with the girls by buying gifts and letting them make their favorite swimsuit model. In a sense, Dead or Alive Paradise is a bit towards the simulation genre, as it gives the player full control to create a private paradise in a certain way. For example, taking girls to explore in many different places, and play with them whenever they want. In addition, there is also a little role-playing element, allowing players to become citizens in the virtual world, to interact and perform many other tasks. A point that most people love is the minigames, and what are you thinking of when you’re on the beach? Yes, exactly volleyball. It is designed similar to the famous Dead or Alive Xtreme 2. If you want to have a more enjoyable experience, you can also play billiards, casinos like poker, blackjack, slot, or swim with beautiful girls.

title: Def Jam – Fight for NY – The Takeover
description: It is a fighting game employing some of rap’s most prominent artists and incorporates actual music. Def Jam Fight for NY: The Takeover is a portable version of its cousins available for consoles, and it features the same gameplay style. The story mode culminates in Def Jam Vendetta and tells how the D-Mob came to rule New York City. In addition, new movements and locations are available to use.

title: Dissidia 012 – Duodecim Final Fantasy
description: Dissidia 012 is the precursor to Square Enix’s title Dissidia: Final Fantasy, released in 2009, and it also includes the tale of the original game, which has been retold to accommodate the game’s new mechanics. The narrative of Dissidia 012 focuses on the twelve-cycle portion of the ongoing War of the Gods and the heroes who were called to the realm for that particular cycle.

title: Dissidia – Final Fantasy
description: In contrast to most of the Final Fantasy titles, Dissidia is primarily a fighting game rather than a traditional role-playing game. However, the intricate tale, character advancement, and personalization options are still there. The game includes protagonists and antagonists from previous installments of the Final Fantasy series, with two characters from each installment appearing in total. The conflict between the two gods, Cosmos and Chaos, drives the story’s action. The protagonists will band together to create teams to overcome Chaos’ army and retrieve their crystals. These teams will then go on to fight through Chaos’ armies. Each character has campaign must be completed before a crystal may be obtained at the end of the story.

title: Dissidia: Final Fantasy
description: Cosmos, the goddess of harmony. Chaos, the god of discord. Reigning from distant realms, the two gods had gathered warriors from all lands to lead them in savage war. Cosmos and Chaos were of equal strength. It was believed the conflict would last forever. However, the balance is now broken. Those who answered Chaos’s call created an inexhaustible force. And under vicious attack without relent, the warriors fighting for Cosmos started to fall one by one. The conflict that has continued for eons is now about to end in Chaos’s favor. The world has been torn asunder, sinking into a vortex of disorder. As for the few surviving warriors- their fates have yet to be determined.

title: Dragon Ball Z – Shin Budokai
description: Dragon Ball Z: Shin Budokai is a fight from Dimps inspired by how popular Akira Toriyama’s Japanese anime was. This is the first game made for the PSP, and it introduces us to the world of Dragon Balls.

title: Dragon Ball Z – Tenkaichi Tag Team
description: Dragon Ball Z: Tenkaichi Tag Team is a fight where the player takes control of the heroes from the Dragon Ball Z series and fights in spectacular, made-up battles between two-person teams. Namco Bandai, a Japanese company, came up with the idea for the show.

title: Dragonball Z – Shin Budokai 2
description: The story revolves around the future Trunks character living in the future, where Babidi appears and will replace. It quickly formed a major battle involving time travel and battles in different worlds. He and Goku, Goten, Gohan along with other teammates fight to stop bad guys. And then the plan to revive the future of Kid Buu was unsuccessful. Later, Kid Buu’s future began to create countless copies of super Buu and pushed the chaos to a climax, forcing everyone to gather their strength to create the ultimate power, wiping out enemies and Kid Buu. Therefore, the battle for the future ended. Trunk and his allies spent the last wish of Dragon Ball to recover the damage caused by the battle, bring peace back to Earth and crush the villain’s ambition to rule the worlds.

title: Driver 76
description: Driver ’76 is the fifth installment in the Driver series, the first after Ubisoft purchased the license from Atari. The game is a prequel to Driver: Parallel Lines, taking place two years before the events of the first game, and features two side characters from the first game, Ray (controlled by the player) and Slink. Ray has set his sights on the daughter of a Triad boss and is attempting to impress him by taking on complex tasks. This gets him into a lot of difficulty with the other gangs, and the plot is portrayed in comic-book style, separated into six chapters.

title: FIFA 08
description: Another annual update to the FIFA Soccer franchise, FIFA Soccer 08, is the fourth installment to be released for the PlayStation Portable (PSP). It improves upon the version released the year before by adding new leagues and teams, updated rosters, and new gameplay modes while keeping all the already present elements.

title: FIFA 09
description: FIFA is EA Sports’ favorite soccer sports game, but it’s not really successful. However, with FIFA 09, it’s different as it’s definitely a great soccer simulation that these king sports fans are looking for. FIFA 09 is really a successful version of EA Sports. The biggest innovation of FIFA 09 is probably the player will control the players with the mouse. For the first time in the history of football games, there is a mouse control instead of just the traditional keyboard. FIFA 09 makes a breakthrough in how to control the game with extremely easy skills to create, for those who are new to the game, only by practicing for a short time, you can use the skills as quickly as lightning. Now, players can experience the game in a whole new perspective that is from behind the player’s back and catch the shots with skillful mouse clicks. Another factor that is relatively new is the improvement in balance on the pitch. If the players used to be able to go all the way from the beginning to the end of the game, they could be exhausted in the 70th minute. And if you don’t make a good line-up, surely you will have to yield the victory to the opponent. Graphics are also a bright spot for this version. The pitch and the players are built on vivid 3D images that will delight players with the peak matches.

title: FIFA 10
description: FIFA Soccer 09 won 25 international gaming awards, and now FIFA Soccer 10 is the best-selling soccer game series from EA SPORTS. FIFA Soccer 10 improved on a game engine that was already very good by focusing on what fans cared most about when they played more than 275 million online games.

title: FIFA 11
description: A famous soccer simulation game molded by EA Sports. This version has added many new features such as career mode, smart goalie, become goalkeeper, manual rankings. In career mode, you can choose to become a player or as a manager. You need to strive to become a famous player or a brilliant manager to find potential top players. Adjustments to the control mode also make the goalkeepers more responsive and react well to dangerous balls. Not only become a player and manager, but you can also now play the goalkeeping mode with perfect saves. The game includes 31 licensed tournaments and includes 39 great teams from many countries. The game has a similar playstyle as the previous versions with a 90-minute match with two extra innings and possibly extra innings. The rules are also simulated, like the actual rules of the game. The game received positive reception and was rated as “Sports game of the year” with a record number of votes.

title: FIFA 12
description: FIFA 12 gives you an authentic football experience, with licensed teams and leagues and intelligent gameplay that mimics the real thing. You can compete as any of more than 500 officially licensed clubs and experience responsive, innovative, and real action. Enjoy turning defenders with advanced dribbling and ball control, shooting with pinpoint accuracy, and passing the ball with perfect timing.

title: FIFA Street 2
description: EA developed the second chapter of the FIFA Street franchise, and it challenges players to take their skills outside of the stadium and onto the streets. In FIFA Street 2, you’ll find a brand-new trick stick control mechanic, upgraded tricks, and a juggle mechanic that tests your skills. You can fool your opponent, juggle the ball on your knees and shoulders, and there are a variety of new combos for you to display. Choose from one of 20 teams representing different regions of the world and watch more than 300 of your favorite football players compete in 4-on-4 matchups. You can choose to play at one of ten other locations, ranging from the Westway Leisure Center in London to the sandy beaches of Brazil.

title: FIFA World Cup – Germany 2006
description: This game, released one month before the actual World Cup in 2006, allows players to compete in all of the matches before they have begun. In addition to the additional teams and classic selectable players, this game includes all the teams that qualified to compete in the 2006 World Cup in Germany and the 12 official German stadiums that hosted the tournament. The playable modes allow you to participate in any qualifying stages or to go straight to the world cup mode while assuming the role of one of the qualified teams. Additional game modes include the Global Challenge, in which players can relive 40 critical moments from football’s rich history, attempt to alter their outcomes, and various multiplayer battles.

title: Family Guy
description: After the Simpsons series, Fox continued the franchise to lead the birth of Family Guy on the PSP. Its content revolves around three characters Stewie, Peter and Stewie. Each of them has their own personality and desire. Although there are many reasons lead to the situation, the real purpose of all three is to defeat Bertram – an evil genius. Three scenarios are written for each individual, Peter, the gameplay is the usual Scrolling-side, where your hero can attack enemies with a punch, or slide. The missions are generally simple, but more varied than Stewie and Platformers if the player does not like repetition between levels. However, the range of weapons and items brought in this section has become more diverse, with machine guns, lasers to health recovery and energy boost. Finally, Brian is actually a dog so he can’t fight. Therefore, his task is simply to stealth, overcome enemies to steal some items or information requested, without being detected.

title: Fight Night Round 3
description: Fight Night Round 3 is the first boxing video game released for the PlayStation Portable (PSP). It is also the third installment of the EA Boxing (Sports) franchise. You can make your own boxer and compete against others in either one-off contests or career-mode bouts. Career modes put you in the ring against opponents of increasing rank and skill and begin with you at the beginning of a professional boxing career. You can work through the levels to become a notable title fighter by training hard and winning matches.

title: Final Fantasy
description: The Game Boy Advance version of Final Fantasy was the basis for developing this game edition. It keeps the CG introduction featured in the Playstation version, along with the additional dungeons, the bestiary, and the unlockable BGM music player included in the previous version. In addition, it has upgraded graphics rendered in a 16:9 aspect ratio and contains larger fonts and higher-quality music and sound effects.

title: Final Fantasy II
description: This remake of the original Final Fantasy II is built around the Game Boy Advance version of the game, which was based on the earlier WonderSwan Color remake. This makes this remake similar to the previously re-released Final Fantasy, also based on the Game Boy Advance version. It includes all the bonuses available in the Game Boy edition, including Soul of Rebirth. Still, it also has new and enhanced graphics, a 16:9 screen format with letters that are easier to see, and higher-quality music and sound. Additionally, the CG opening sequence from the PlayStation edition has been remade in a 16:9 aspect ratio. In addition to that, it features illustration galleries created by Yoshitaka Amano.

title: Final Fantasy IV – Complete Collection
description: The following are included in Final Fantasy IV: The Complete Collection:

title: Final Fantasy Tactics – The War of the Lions
description: This gaming classic will be reintroduced to a new generation of players thanks to the game’s rebirth and enhancements, which include the addition of never-before-seen cinematic scenes, an entirely new English translation, a presentation in 16:9 widescreen, and multiplayer functionality.

title: From Russia with Love – 007
description: 007: From Russia with Love is based on the 1963 film starring Sean Connery as James Bond and builds on the qualities of 007: Everything or Nothing. He is dispatched to Istanbul to obtain the Russian decoder machine known as the Lektor from an (allegedly) defecting Russian spy named Tatiana Romanova. On the other hand, the Russians are unaware of this plot since it is a trap set for James Bond by the criminal organization Octopus. It is up to James Bond to capture the device and battle the vicious Rosa Klebb and the lethal assassin Red Grant.

title: Gangs of London
description: In Gangs of London, the player assumes the position of a criminal gang member seeking to take control of London. The central gameplay premise is similar to that of the GTA series, except instead of a free-roaming experience, the campaign consists of 70 brief missions selected from a menu screen. A comic-style story arc accompanies each one and has a variety of objectives: escorting, infiltrating an enemy station, stealing cars, kidnapping people, racing, defending one’s position against enemy waves, and killing people.

title: Ghost Rider
description: The Marvel Comics character Ghost Rider is the inspiration for the action-packed video game of the same name, which takes place after the events of the movie.

title: God of War – Chains of Olympus
description: In the third installment of the God of War series, Kratos debuted on a handheld gaming platform for the first time. A prequel to the first God of War game, Chains of Olympus, takes place ten years before the events of that game. The gameplay is very similar to that of its predecessors, but there have been a few tweaks here and there. As Kratos progresses through the stages, he must defeat foes and bosses, complete puzzles based on boxes, and participate in quick-time events. In addition, he gathers red orbs to strengthen his weapons and abilities, gorgon eyeballs to improve his health, and phoenix feathers to enhance his magic power.
publisher: WW: Sony Computer Entertainment / JP: Capcom

title: God of War – Ghost of Sparta
description: God of War: Ghost of Sparta is a spin-off game between God of War and God of War II events. This game also marks Kratos’s second debut on a portable platform. Even though Kratos has attained the status of god of war, he continues to be plagued by terrifying visions. One of these visions shows his mother, Callisto, being held captive in Atlantis, which is the dominion of Poseidon, the god of the sea. Kratos embarks on a new quest despite Athena’s recommendation that he disregard it to learn more about his history and, ultimately, free his long-lost brother Deimos from the grasp of Thanatos, the god of death.

title: Gods Eater Burst
description: In the game GODS EATER BURST, the planet is overrun by monstrous mutated animals known as Aragami. The player has been recruited as a new member of an elite squad designed to wield the God Arc, the only weapon capable of destroying the Aragami and consuming the antagonistic gods. The player aims to defeat the Aragami and steal information and artifacts from them for research purposes. However, the player will quickly find that they are being sucked into a massive plot that will permanently alter the course of human history.

title: Gran Turismo
description: Gran Turismo is the first game in Sony’s Gran Turismo series for the PlayStation Portable.

title: Grand Theft Auto – Chinatown Wars
description: The player takes control of Huang Lee, a member of the Triads in modern Liberty City, in Chinatown Wars. Huang returns from China to bring a ceremonial sword to his uncle Wu “Kenny” Lee to safeguard the Triad lords’ inheritance. However, soon after his arrival, he is jumped, shot, robbed, and left for dead, only to survive and swear revenge for his father and the recovery of the stolen sword to restore respect to his family.

title: Grand Theft Auto – Liberty City Stories
description: This is the next game in the Grand Theft Auto series, and it is set in Liberty City once again, just like GTA 3.

title: Grand Theft Auto – Vice City Stories
description: Vice City Stories is the sequel to Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City Stories and a prelude to Grand Theft Auto: Vice City (2 years earlier). Players assume the role of Vic Vance, an army man who loves his nation, family, and himself in 1984. One wrong decision changes everything, and he finds himself on the streets of a dangerous city. To survive, he must construct an empire or be left to perish. The siblings attempt to take over Vice City with the help of his drug-addicted brother Lance.

title: Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City Stories
description: This is the next installation of the Grand Theft Auto series, now back in Liberty City, just like GTA 3.

title: Gun Showdown
description: Gun: Showdown is an action game in which you play as Colton White, a gunman in the American West. When your companion is murdered, you embark on a mission for vengeance and justice.

title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
description: An action-adventure video game, Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire is based on the plot of the fourth film in the Harry Potter film series and the book of the same name. The Triwizard Tournament will be held at Hogwarts, and for some reason, Harry will be competing in it. This means that Harry, Ron, and Hermione will face even more challenges and dangers than usual.

title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
description: Based on the fifth book in the series and the movie of the same name, players take control of Harry Potter in this 3D adventure as he navigates the perils of his fifth year at Hogwarts, avoids the treacherous Professor Dolores Umbridge, builds Dumbledore’s Army, and engages in combat with Voldemort himself as the prophecy continues to play out.

title: Harvest Moon – Hero of Leaf Valley
description: The peaceful town of Leaf Valley is going to be torn down! If the town’s people don’t find a way to stop the heartless Funland Corporation, they will destroy the city and build an amusement park. To save Leaf Valley and your family farm, you’ll need to grow crops, raise animals, and mine ores and gems. With a branching storyline and different ways to save the town, it’s up to you how you want to do it.
publisher: JP: Marvelous Entertainment / NA: Natsume / EU: Rising Star Games

title: Initial D – Street Stage
description: After several electronic games with the Initial D name, the new version takes the player back to Japan to race around the art of drifting. Street Stage is a straight copy of the automatic edition called Arcade Stage and was made better by Version 3 in 2004.

title: Iron Man
description: This videogame of the one-man-army hero has been adapted heavily from the film Iron Man, which was released in 2008, and has been made available for seven various types of gaming consoles.

title: Jak and Daxter – The Lost Frontier
description: After the conclusion of Jak X: Combat Racing, Jak & Daxter: The Lost Frontier continues the story from where it left off. To explore the recent lack of Eco, Jak, Daxter, and Kiera journey to the Brink, which is located at the edge of the known world; there, they become embroiled in a conflict that is taking place between the people who live in the region and a band of Sky Pirates.

title: James Cameron’s Avatar – The Game
description: The movie picture Avatar was directed by James Cameron, who was also involved in the creative process of developing the video game Avatar: The Game, which is a third-person action game.

title: Jeanne d’Arc
description: It is the 15th century, and England and France are engaged in the Hundred Years’ War. A little French girl from Domremy attempting to aid her father with his daily labors discovers a remarkable object: an armlet that miraculously bonds around her wrist. The town is soon assaulted, and she moves forward with the first weapon she can find to confront the enemy, some humanoid monsters. Using the armlet for power, hearing a mysterious voice, and with the help of her close friends, she defeats them and starts on a long adventure to help her compatriots and fight the evil forces attacking France.

title: Justice League Heroes
description: Military robots wreak mayhem in a Metropolis research center known for its cutting-edge technology. In Finland, the top-secret Deep Space Communications Array is taken over by creatures that have been created through genetic engineering. A Nevada missile site is taken over by a group of outlaws with extraordinary abilities who have never worked together. And scores of extraterrestrial warriors, who had been imprisoned for a long time deep beneath the surface of Mars, are finally allowed to break free…

title: Killzone – Liberation
description: Killzone Liberation is the follow-up to the PlayStation 2 game Killzone. You play as a Templar again, two months after the previous game’s events, this time taking the war to the Helghast. Previously, the ISA could beat them back, but they have reorganized, and you must battle the crafty General Metric, who has captured most of southern Vekta in 16 missions.

title: Kingdom Hearts – Birth by Sleep
description: The Japanese cRPG Kingdom Hearts: Birth by Sleep is the next part of the Kingdom Hearts trilogy. The Square-Enix studio made the best-selling Final Fantasy series, and the game was made by the same people who made the Chain of Memories version of the series for the GBA.

title: LEGO Batman – The Video Game
description: Another video game based on the iconic bricks, LEGO Batman: The Videogame, was created by Traveller’s Tales and released for the PC, Xbox 360, and other gaming platforms (also known for the well-received LEGO Star Wars series). Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment acted as publisher for the production (WBIE). The video game was made accessible for download on virtually every platform, including personal computers running Windows and consoles of both older and more recent generations. Much like LEGO Star Wars, the game combines the world of LEGO bricks with another universe, in this case, that of Batman.

title: LEGO Harry Potter – Years 1-4
description: J. K. Rowling’s fantastical universe is the backdrop for LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1-4, an action-adventure video game inspired by LEGO Indiana Jones, LEGO Batman, and LEGO Star Wars. It was created by a collaboration between LEGO Group, Traveller’s Tales, and Warner Bros. Interactive.

title: LEGO Indiana Jones – The Original Adventures
description: The same team that developed the critically acclaimed and award-winning LEGO Star Wars 1 and 2 video games has released their newest video game, Indiana Jones: The Original Adventures.

title: LEGO Pirates of the Caribbean – The Video Game
description: Fans of Batman, Indiana Jones, Harry Potter, and Luke Skywalker are among those who already like playing LEGO games. Another title that was developed by Traveller’s Tales, a British studio, was created just for fans of the Pirates of the Caribbean movie series who like following Jack Sparrow and his crew on their seafaring adventures. LEGO Pirates of the Caribbean was published by Disney Interactive, which also ensured that the game will debut at the same time as the fourth installment of the Pirates of the Caribbean franchise, which stars Johnny Depp and is titled Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides.

title: LEGO Star Wars II – The Original Trilogy
description: The Legos strike back in the sequel to the original LEGO Star Wars: The Video Game, where players can now explore the classic Star Wars trilogy (Episodes IV, V, and VI). Players replicate all three original Star Wars films using LEGO-sized Star Wars characters. All sets and props are made of LEGO bricks and maintain features like the capacity to be rebuilt and fall apart. Like its predecessor, the game puts its take on the series by adding a lighthearted, funny touch to the movies and employing no language.

title: LEGO Star Wars III – The Clone Wars
description: LEGO Star Wars III: The Clone Wars is the third LEGO Star Wars game for PC, Xbox 360, and other platforms. Traveller’s Tales, the company that made all of the other LEGO games, made this one (including LEGO Batman, Harry Potter, and Indiana Jones).

title: Little Big Planet
description: Visit the world of LittleBigPlanet, where your creativity and dreams can run wild! Become a Sackperson and customize your appearance with various items found in the game environments. Explore the levels created by the Creator Curators, or share your own with the world!

title: Loco Roco
description: The blob-like LocoRoco is in danger! A meteor has crashed-landed on their planet, bringing the black, shaggy Moja Troop, who enjoy LocoRoco. They’ll soon be nearly all gone! You are responsible for taking control of the earth with your PSP and repopulating it with LocoRoco.

title: Loco Roco 2
description: The ominous Moja Troop reappeared when the LocoRoco assumed that everyone was secure and joyful. The LocoRoco enjoy singing, but the Moja have now learned a song of their own – one that is so terrible that it can drain the life force from anyone and everything alive! Once more, the player needs to exercise control over the world to ensure the safety of the LocoRoco and the entire planet!

title: Lord of Arcana
description: The action role-playing game Lord of Arcana transports the player (controlling a character that can be customized) to the land of Horodyn, where he must earn the Arcana power to progress through the game. To achieve this goal, he will need to refine his talents by completing quests given to him by the slayers guild in the settlement of Porto Carillo. The objectives of the investigations include defeating certain enemies, collecting certain materials, and so on. As the player’s strength increases, the Arcana Stones in the adjacent Arayd Temple will begin to awaken. This will open the door for the player to fight the Master Guardians and take their power.

title: MX vs. ATV – On the Edge
description: MX vs. ATV: On the Edge will have you racing through the mud in no time! Please choose your preferred mode of transportation, be it an MX bike, an ATV, a dune buggy, a monster truck, or a golf cart (!), and race across various unique courses, ranging from woodlands to stadiums. You can also perform crazy tricks to earn enormous points and show off in front of your rivals.

title: Manhunt 2
description: Search 2 does not expand on the events and story of the first game. Instead, the same game elements are applied to a different setting, the Dixmor Insane Asylum, where the staff likes to beat up and experiment on the inmates rather than treat their disease. A power outage one day allows the patients to mutiny and wreak havoc on the asylum. The player can take on two roles: Dr. Daniel Lamb and Leo Kasper. Although the story begins at the asylum, the action quickly shifts to other settings.

title: Marvel – Ultimate Alliance
description: The Masters of Evil are a group of villains Dr. Doom brought together. Over twenty of Marvel’s most powerful characters, including Spider-Man, Captain America, Wolverine, Ghost Rider, Blade, and Silver Surfer, have banded together for the first time to defeat Doom. As you cross the Marvel Universe to stop this threat, you can form teams of four Marvel superheroes using any combination of characters you like. Additional benefits can be gained by utilizing specific groups, such as the Fantastic Four and the New Avengers.

title: Marvel – Ultimate Alliance 2
description: A year after the battle between Marvel and Von Bardas, during a survey of a member of the Marvel team who went missing after sending a piece of information about suspected criminal activity. Soon after, a team was sent to investigate and quickly discovered the plot of the Latverian army, led by a cyborg Von Bardas to destroy New York. The group soon fought to prevent this plan from becoming a reality and was fortunate to succeed. However, it has left some significant damage to the city and sparked a controversy that the government must enact a law for heroes. While the discussion of this law was taking place outside, Titanium Man attacked Washington DC and forced superheroes not to turn a blind eye to stand up to fight.

title: Medal of Honor – Heroes
description: You play as three different characters from previous Medal of Honor games in three separate campaigns across Italy, Belgium, and Holland in this addition to the Medal of Honor franchise: Lt. James Patterson from the original MOH and MOH: Frontline, Sgt. John Baker from MOH: Allied Assault, and Lt. William Holt from MOH: European Assault. Each campaign comprises various tasks that entail capturing or destroying specific objectives.

title: Medal of Honor – Heroes 2
description: In the sequel to the PSP-exclusive Medal of Honor: Heroes, players take on the role of OSS Operative John Berg in eight missions during the June 1944 Normandy campaign. With the assistance of US troops, he must go behind enemy lines and prevent Hitler from deploying the V2 rocket. Briefings with still voices and narrated voice-overs tell the story.

title: Mega Man – Maverick Hunter X
description: Mega Man Maverick Hunter X is a remake of the original SNES game Mega Man X, set a century after the actual Mega Man series events, and tells the story of Dr. Light’s most incredible creation: X, a robot with free will. Dr. Cain’s discovery of X resulted in the development of reploids, which are robots modeled after the design of X. When the Maverick virus infects a group of reploids, they come together in an anti-human revolution. The maverick hunters, X and Zero, are summoned to confront the Mavericks.

title: Metal Gear Solid – Peace Walker
description: Following the events of Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater, Naked Snake withdraws from the United States and establishes himself in Colombia. He creates Militaires Sans Frontières (Soldiers Without Borders), a private military organization that aids developing countries. The story of Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker will explain the circumstances that led to Militaires Sans Frontières becoming Outer Heaven in later games and seeing him eventually accept his place as Big Boss. Snake is still grappling with guilt after the murder of someone close to him.

title: Metal Gear Solid – Portable Ops
description: Unlike the earlier Metal Gear Ac!d games with turn-based strategy gameplay, Metal Gear Solid: Portable Ops is the first actual Metal Gear game on the PSP.

title: Metal Gear Solid – Portable Ops Plus
description: A separate add-on to Metal Gear Solid: Portable Ops that focuses mainly on the game’s multiplayer component. There is a single-player mode called Infinity Mission, although no plot is associated. In addition, new tasks and tutorials are available for players just starting. This game continues the theme of capturing and enlisting new allies by supporting up to six players over WiFi and introducing new characters such as Old Snake from Metal Gear Solid 4, Roy Campbell, and Raiden from Metal Gear Solid 2.

title: Metal Slug Anthology
description: The Neo Geo Metal Slug series is celebrating its 10th anniversary with the release of this anthology, which includes ports of the series’ most critical previous titles. These are the titles that are included:

title: Metal Slug XX
description: The next installment in the long-running series of side-scrolling shooters known as Metal Slug is called Metal Slug XX. Metal Slug 7 has been updated to include these changes. Once again, the members of the Peregrine Falcons—Marco, Eri, Clark, Tarma, Fio, and Ralf—are dashing and gunning through vibrantly hand-drawn levels, hurling explosives, piloting vehicles, and cutting adversaries.

title: Midnight Club 3 – DUB Edition
description: Midnight Club 3: DUB Edition follows its predecessors’ high-speed, open-city racing heritage. It also has the total automobile customization ever included in a video game, with options ranging from the license plate (including state and number combinations) to the rim size. In contrast to the international route of Midnight Club 2, which passed via Los Angeles, Paris, and Tokyo, racers will find themselves competing in three different locations within the United States: San Diego, Atlanta, and Detroit. Featuring over 60 legal vehicles, which are not restricted to only automobiles; in addition to SUVs and bikes, classic muscle cars, choppers, and law enforcement vehicles are all included in the mix.

title: Midnight Club – L.A. Remix
description: After an absence of three years, the Midnight Club series is finally returning to the PSP. This title was released at the same time as Midnight Club: Los Angeles for Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3, and they also share the same release date. It utilizes the tried-and-true formula of Midnight Club to deliver an experience with a similar theme—namely, a street racing competition set in Los Angeles. Since the previous release of the PSP, the graphics have been refined, and additional racing modes have been added to the package.

title: Monster Hunter Freedom
description: This version of Monster Hunter is a port of the game Monster Hunter G, which was only available in Japan. Monster Hunter G is a sequel to the first Monster Hunter game; it’s more like a director’s cut of the game. A significant portion of the game is very similar to the version available on the Playstation 2, although many new elements have been included. You now have access to a greater variety of quests, monsters, weapons, and armor, as well as more regions surrounding the town from which to choose and exploit for your benefit.

title: Monster Hunter Freedom 2
description: Monster Hunter Freedom 2 is the sequel to Monster Hunter Freedom, which was based on the PlayStation 2 game Monster Hunter 2, which was never released outside of Japan. Monster Hunter Freedom 2 was developed by Capcom and published by Nintendo. This game is not a direct port from its original release on the PlayStation 2. Some game components have been modified, while others have been eliminated to adapt the game to its new portable version. For instance, item boxes may be used as global deposits, allowing players to store stuff and access it anytime, even when not in their “home” zone.

title: Monster Hunter Freedom Unite
description: According to the developers, monster Hunter Freedom Unite has around 400 tasks to complete and a playtime of up to 500 hours. In this version of the game, there are new locales, monsters, weapon and armor sets, and set combinations to choose from.

title: Monster Hunter Portable 3rd
description: Monster Hunter Portable 3rd has some parts of a cRPG and some parts of an action game. This is another part of a series that Capcom has been making for a few years, and that has become very popular in Japan.

title: Mortal Kombat – Unchained
description: Mortal Kombat: Unchained is the portable version of the game Mortal Kombat: Deception, initially released on consoles. It includes all of the characters from the GameCube version and four additional ones unique to the PSP version. These four characters are Blaze, Frost, Jax, and Kitana. An ancient foe has resurfaced in this episode of the 3D beat-em-up series that has returned. The protagonists engage in combat with one another to win the right to take on and defeat this threat and become the Champion of the Elder Gods.

title: MotorStorm – Arctic Edge
description: In the arcade racing game Motorstorm: Arctic Edge, you compete against up to eight other players, either human or computer-controlled, to take first place in The Festival. The state of Alaska serves as the setting for the game, during which players compete on frozen courses located in mountainous areas. Along the path to victory, besides the other competitors, you will need to keep an eye out for avalanches, broken ice bridges, and many other potential hazards.

title: NBA 2K12
description: In the early 1980s, when basketball became the most popular sport, it became popular with all walks of life. During his teenage years, he spent all his time and effort practicing and later growing up to join the NBA. From a faint influence on the team, Bill Russell gradually proved the unique skills, innate talents, and passion for the ball on the field. He gradually became a professional athlete, an irreplaceable jewel of the NBA.

title: NBA Street Showdown
description: NBA Street is a portable game for the Playstation Portable.

title: NHL 25 – Playoff Edition
description: We are pleased to announce the next mod iteration for NHL 07 PSP, NHL 25 Playoff Edition is now released! It includes new improvements, along with much of the NHL 24-25 season, such as:

title: Namco Museum Battle Collection
description: The Namco Museum Battle Collection is a compilation of some of Namco’s most well-known and beloved arcade games that have been adapted for play on the PSP. 17 games were first released in arcades, and they are as follows:

title: Naruto Shippuden – Kizuna Drive
description: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Kizuna Drive, the first game in the popular action-fighting series to have four-player cell co-op combat, brings the authentic team-based action that has always been a part of NARUTO to the PSP (PlayStation Portable) system. Make your perfect team out of the many fan-favorite playable characters, each with its unique set of weapons. You can take your co-op attacks to the next level as battles go on by using the Kizuna Drive combat system, a devastating in-game feature that will destroy your enemies. NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Kizuna Drive is a team-based fighting game with a brand-new story, the ability to play with more than one person, a lot of collectibles, and an opening movie made by the famous Studio Pierrot.

title: Naruto Shippuden – Legends – Akatsuki Rising
description: The handheld console gets the first Naruto Shippuden-based 3D action-adventure game. They become more mature, faster, and stronger when you give them the strategy, power, and skill to fight off the fierce Akatsuki ninjas in lush environments. In the next game in the Naruto Shippuden series, you can play differently and use the controls more easily while watching a new and exciting chapter unfold.

title: Naruto Shippuden – Ultimate Ninja Heroes 3
description: The fighting game Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Heroes 3, available for the PSP, is similar to the other titles in the series. The player must employ a variety of various ninja methods depending on the character that they select. Aside from that, players can utilize weapons such as shurikens of a larger size or bombs that kill people. The player can quickly move between the foreground and the backdrop levels by pressing a simple set of buttons, as each combat takes place on two distinct levels: the foreground and the background.

title: Naruto Shippuden – Ultimate Ninja Impact
description: The all-new ‘Rush Battle System’ introduced in NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja Impact ushers in a new era for the Ultimate Ninja series of video games. The newly implemented combat system forces players to rely on their gut instincts as they battle against hordes of foes in 1 vs. 100 matches. The players’ strategic abilities will be put to the test in a variety of challenging encounters against colossal bosses. Learn more about the NARUTO SHIPPUDEN plot by experiencing it through Naruto and Sasuke’s perspectives.

title: Naruto – Ultimate Ninja Heroes
description:
Naruto Ultimate Ninja Heroes
Construct the ninja team of your dreams using characters drawn from the expansive world of Naruto. This is the first Naruto-themed Wireless game, and both the manga and the anime inspired it.

title: Naruto – Ultimate Ninja Heroes 2 – The Phantom Fortress
description: The Hidden Leaf Village is in peril after a flying fortress falls over it and begins stealing the people’s life power. Naruto infiltrates the castle with his buddies to find out who is behind the arrival of the phantom stronghold, during which images of a masked woman with a grudge against the Leaf Ninjas torture him.

title: Need for Speed Carbon – Own the City
description: The Need for Speed: Carbon – Own the City game you are currently playing is not like its predecessors, even though both versions carry the same name. Neither canyon racing nor drift is racing like in the other game versions.

title: Need for Speed – Most Wanted 5-1-0
description: The second Need for Speed game to be made available on the PlayStation Portable (PSP) is called Most Wanted 5-1-0. The numerals in the title relate to the police code for street racing. Much like Need for Speed: Most Wanted, the game revolves around a career mode and a feature called Blacklist 15, in which the player must advance in the rankings by winning races against several other players. However, there is no backstory, and all of the cutscenes have also been taken out.

title: Need for Speed – ProStreet
description: The racing video game Need for Speed: ProStreet is a fast-paced, action-packed competition in which players compete to become the best driver on the road. The gameplay is straightforward to understand: on each of the game’s 13 courses (the first 10 of which must be unlocked), the player can compete in one of the numerous championships, such as ordinary races, time races, or elimination competitions. Should he emerge victorious, he will be awarded money, which he will put toward enhancing the performance of his vehicle through various modifications.

title: Need for Speed – Shift
description: The first difference that we can easily see in this game compared to previous versions is that it has no plot. This is something that I quite like because for a racing game, having a storyline is completely unnecessary and should instead focus on the player’s experience. The absence of a story does not mean that this game will become dull but in contrast to the catchy, vibrant music, suitable for the atmosphere of a race plus the smooth interface and lively images are the points that make players feel extremely impressed. Although there are two options that are the first view and the third perspective, I have a piece of sincere advice that you should try to feel behind the wheel of the first view because it will make you feel like you driving a real-life racing car. Every time the gas pedal accelerates or brakes, the screen will vibrate a bit like I’m actually driving. The laws of physics in real life have been put into the game in a very subtle way to make you feel like the real thing but not too much to make you feel dizzy.

title: Need for Speed – Undercover
description: Electronic Arts have made 12 racing games, and Need for Speed: Undercover is the twelfth. The company’s Canadian branch made it, and it broke away from the idea of legal track racing that was shown to customers in ProStreet and went back to the underworld. This is the first product in the series to be available not just on PCs and consoles but also on iPhones.

title: Need for Speed – Underground Rivals
description: Rivals are the first racing game to bring an exciting nighttime scenario to the PSP. This version’s images and animations have been “tuned” to display more effectively on the compact screen used for testing. There are 24 vehicles, 10 of which are classified as muscle cars. Drift Attack, Nitrous Run, Drag Race, Car Spec, Lap Knockout, and Circuit are the 8 game types included in the game. Rally Relay is a new game mode that is exclusive to the PSP. All ten racing circuits offer unique course configurations only available in this game. You will be able to tune and customize your vehicles, much like in the other games in the Underground Series, and you will have a Pocket Garage to display them in.

title: Obscure The Aftermath
description: It’s been two years since the incident at Leafmore High that you saw in ObsCure and the nightmare survivors have moved on to Fallcreek University. They assumed everything was fine when they killed Herbert Friedman, the leader of the biological experiment with the black blossoms, but it wasn’t. The flower’s seeds had already spread, expanding and flowing without much notice. When the flowers were discovered to contain a toxic ingredient that creates bizarre but vivid dreams, they quickly became the campus’s new hit drug. The seeds germinate, and the lousy trip becomes a terrifying nightmare. The only people who truly understand what is happening are those who are experiencing it for the second time and hiding awful secrets within themselves…

title: PES 2014: Pro Evolution Soccer
description: Pro Evolution Soccer 2014 centers everything on the ball including how it moves and how players use it. First touch and sublime control are what set certain players apart from others. The ability to not only read a pass, but to be one step ahead and to know what is needed to gain yards on an encroaching defender. Trueball Tech allows the player to trap or knock on a pass using the analogue stick with detailed bar-centric physics determining the weight shift of the player and the height and speed of the pass, as to how the player’s body will automatically shape to receive it. The Pro Evolution Soccer series has long since treated the ball as an individual entity, allowing the player huge amounts of freedom to pass into space, run on to a knocked-on counter, or produces short triangular passes to make space. Trueball Tech adds even more freedom, with full 360-degree control within several yards around the player and the ability to shield the ball from opposing players, use deft controls to wrong-foot them, and intuitive methods to master close control.

title: Pac-Man World 3
description: Orson transports Pac-Man across 15 distinct levels to battle Erwin and his army of robots, monsters, and Spectral Entities to preserve the planet, Pac-Land, and the Spectral Realm. In Erwin’s scheme to take over the world, the Spectral Realm will be drained of its spectral energy so that his army of robots can be powered by it. Pac-Man can overcome Erwin and his henchmen by punching, doing Rev Rolls, butt-bouncing, and using a variety of new Power Pellets. During the conflict with Erwin’s mechanized forces, Pac-Man also takes control of Toc-Man.

title: Patapon
description: In the past, the Patapon tribe, under the leadership of their god Almighty, was a great power that had to be reckoned with. As they looked for the legendary Earthend, they overcame any threat and got any treasure they desired. Nonetheless, those times are a distant memory, and the Patapons of today are a pale reflection of who they once were. Assume the responsibilities of the All-Powerful, and lead the Patapons to their previous grandeur!

title: Patapon 2
description: This game is a direct continuation of the Patapon series. The tiny eyeball warriors have resumed their search for “IT” at Earthend and have returned. The player once again assumes the position of “The Mighty One” or “Mighty Patapon” to guide the party through their various trials by beating the sacred Pata, Pon, Chaka, and Don drums in time with the beat of the game’s background music (BGM). The Patapons will act in various other orders when different combinations are used.

title: Patapon 3
description: Patapon 3 is the sequel to the previous films in the series, Patapon and Patapon 2. The gameplay is identical to that of the game’s predecessor, in which the player’s objective is to lead the Patapon army to victory in battle by pounding the Pon, Pata, Chaka, and Don sacred drums in rhythm with the music to issue orders to the Patapons. This time, however, the player does not control the all-powerful Patapon god; instead, they assume the role of an Uberhero and can team up with other Uberheroes in the game’s multiplayer mode.

title: Phantasy Star Portable 2
description: Phantasy Star Portable 2 is the sequel to the action role-playing game Phantasy Star Portable. Most of the action RPG gameplay characteristics are comparable to the original. The game’s events occur three years after the conclusion of Phantasy Star Universe when all four races have been defeated and barred from accessing the SEED. The player takes on the role of a member of the private military mercenary squad known as Little Wing, which is based on the space colony resort of Clad 6.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean – At World’s End
description: A strategy game based on the popular Pirates of the Caribbean series, which has been modeled on major running events, such as What was shown in the movie version. Join, players will be immersed in characters such as Jack, Will, Elizabeth, Barbossa. With the ultimate goal of finding the treasure, you will have to fight hand-to-hand with enemies in many areas with only a single weapon. To be able to defeat the enemy, combine the available techniques to form a combo with more damage and faster speed. For each victory, you will receive gold to buy new equipment and weapons.

title: Prince of Persia – Revelations
description: Prince of Persia: Revelations is an improved port of the PlayStation Portable version of Prince of Persia: Warrior Within. It has all of the acrobatics, combat, time-bending, and puzzle-solving elements in the first game, in addition to approximately twenty new chambers, the majority of which include new puzzles.

title: Prince of Persia – Rival Swords
description: After many dangerous adventures, the Prince returns to Babylon, accompanied by his new bride, Kaileena, the Empress of Time. Their dreams of a calm and happy future together are destroyed when they arrive in Persia to find the country devastated by war. The terrible Vizier soon captures and murders Kaileena, and her death unleashes the Sands of Time, from which the Vizier gains terrifying new powers.

title: Prince of Persia – The Forgotten Sands
description: The Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands video game for the PlayStation Portable (PSP) was produced by the same team that worked on the Wii version, but the PSP version is an entirely different game with a new plot, new landscapes, and new foes. The Prince is hunting for the evil fire spirit Ahihud and his followers, who are responsible for the deaths of the Prince’s family members and the seizure of power in his country. The gameplay consists of various forms of 3D side-view platforming and action. A large number of acrobatic abilities, such as walking on walls and swinging from ledges, are available to the player due to this feature. In addition, there are a variety of puzzles to solve throughout the game, the majority of which involve moving objects about and attempting to unlock doors. For a few of them, you’ll need special skills you can only get by releasing the Sisters of Time. The player is granted a unique ability to manipulate time by each of these spirits that they acquire.

title: Pro Evolution Soccer 2011
description: Pro Evolution Soccer 2011 for PC, PS3 and other platforms is the latest game in the Japanese football series. It was made by an internal Konami team led by Shingo “Seabass” Takatsuki and released yearly. The new entry adds new features and removes some of the things that the previous entries were built on.

title: Pro Evolution Soccer 2012
description: The world of football in 2012 was fascinating, with fiery matches taking place all over the world, especially the top matches on the European turf. Barcelona team after winning the championship UEFA CHAMPION LEAGUE in 2011 will be able to break the curse can not gain two consecutive years of the most attractive tournament of the old continent or will the steady rise of the Spanish royal team Real Madrid as well as the mighty powers of English football such as Manchester United or Chelsea. Messi after a hugely successful season can continue to win more Golden Ball or will be the return of Cristiano Ronaldo after many years to the enemy’s dominance. This will be an extremely anticipated season for fans.

title: Pursuit Force
description: Five gangs are responsible for the widespread fear and panic in the cities: the Warlords, the Capelli Family, Killer66, the Vixens, and the Convicts. Cities are in disarray because their regular police forces are powerless to restore order. As a result, a specialized force known as the Pursuit Force is established to combat such a danger. As a result, this technical force was established, and you are an integral component of that group.

title: Ratatouille
description: Remy is a mouse that loves eating. He is trying to prevent Skinner from being a villain who plans to build a restaurant, but based on the reputation of chef Auguste Gusteau. Remy didn’t accept her idol being a brand for cheap food, so she didn’t let it happen. Following the long journey, some of the first missions will help players understand the ability of the protagonist, as well as plans for the future. The idea of ​​each level is to collect herbs, food, fruits or anything else that appears along the way. Completely lacking the appearance of monsters, the only obstacle here is the environment. They are designed to include pitfalls, forcing players to climb, or finding something reasonable to overcome. It also includes a number of minigames, which leads to another difficult road facing. However, the gameplay is mostly transparent and easy to grasp. But whether or not you continue to develop the process, it depends on your cleverness.

title: Ratchet & Clank – Size Matters
description: Ratchet & Clank: Size Matters is the first Ratchet & Clank game to be released for the PSP, and it is identical to the console versions. The duo is drawn into a strange adventure in this 3D action platformer and soon discovers a forgotten race of genius innovators known as the Technomites. These scientists set out to create a clone army.

title: Resistance Retribution
description: Resistance: Retribution takes several weeks after the events of Resistance: Fall of Man on the PlayStation 3. James Grayson, a former British Marine, is the player. Grayson discovers his brother has been infected with the Chimera virus and destroys every conversion center he can find. The Maquis enlists Grayson to recapture Europe from the Chimera. The game is a third-person shooter with a cover system allowing players to hide behind objects. Grayson can quickly emerge from hiding and strike the adversary while hiding from Chimera. When Grayson approaches the covers, they automatically lock, and aiming help is supplied.

title: Rock Band Unplugged
description: Harmonix’s music series debutedt on a portable device with Rock Band Unplugged. Based on the same gameplay concept as Rock Band and Rock Band 2, Unplugged adapts the image for play via buttons rather than instrument controllers while preserving most of the playing modes and settings found in Rock Band and Rock Band 2.

title: SNK Arcade Classics Vol.1
description: On a single disc, this compilation features sixteen of the most popular old SNK arcade games:

title: SNK Arcade Classics Volume
description: Do you like to play many games? Do you like bundled gadgets? Are you afraid of downloading many games to your PSP? Your worries will now be resolved through SNK Arcade Classics Volume. This is a game title that summarises many small and popular games. It includes 16 Neo Geo games according to previous versions. Each game includes eight challenges. When you successfully overcome these challenges, you will receive a Certificate of Merit for your talents and effort. You can use these medals to unlock a number of other games like Concept Art, Music, Movelists, World Heroes. At the end of each challenge, you will receive information boards related to the previous match to gain experience for the following matches. In addition, if you are not satisfied with the result, you can replay it from the beginning. The game includes many small game genres that you can play all day without getting bored. Corresponding to each game, the control keys will be equivalent to the individual task. You will receive instructions for using the buttons before you start playing. You can play the game alone, or you can play with your friends over a wifi connection, or you can send a demo of the game directly to your friend.

title: SOCOM – U.S. Navy SEALs Fireteam Bravo 3
description: Players take on the role of commander Calvin Hopper and lead a SEAL team on a secret mission on national security to search and interrogate the former KGB agent Vasyli Gozorov. He is believed to be holding information on an upcoming attack with weapons of mass destruction. His team member is Toro, who has just graduated from BUD / S training with SANDMAN and RAVEN. After searching Gozorov’s office, they discovered a weapon cache and ambushed by an RPG explosion. They had defeated the ambush. After interrogating an injured shooter, he revealed that he was from the Koratvian Revolutionary Army but said nothing more than where the unit stationed. From here, the difficulties came.

title: SOCOM – U.S. Navy SEALs – Fireteam Bravo 2
description: Fireteam Bravo 2, the sequel to the PSP game SOCOM: U.S. Navy SEALs – Fireteam Bravo, keeps the basic idea from the first game but improves upon it in a variety of ways, including adding new team members, new weapons, the Local Influence system, and the Command Equity system for unlocking features, amongst other things.

title: SOCOM – U.S. Navy SEALs – Tactical Strike
description: The SOCOM series has three hand-held games, and the most recent one is called Tactical Strike. This one is unique compared to its other console relatives. Not only does the player have the option to take command of a team of United States Navy Seals, but they also have the option to take command of any of the number of international units that perform duties analogous to those of the SEALS. These international units include the Dutch KCT, the German KSK, the Australian SASR, the Italian 9th Parachute Assault Regiment, the Spanish UOE, the British SAS, the French GIGN, and the South Korean 707th Special Mission Unit.

title: Scarface – Money. Power. Respect.
description: “Scarface – Money. Power. Respect” with a third perspective is an attractive strategy game. Start the game, you will play a drug smuggler through the roads from Miami to Florida Keys & Bahama. It is important to complete the task of bringing the drug to the place of the buyer, which needs to have a reasonable tactic to escape the pursuit of the DEA. Up to two game modes for players to choose from experience: single-player and multiplayer mode. In single-player mode, the missions will follow the rules of the storyline, which in turn appears to require the player to complete. In multiplayer mode, each game will have four players and a criminal gang. They work together to help allies complete missions based on tactics that cut off the pursuit of changing these policemen. The amount of reward after completing each mission will be equally divided among members of the gang. Through missions that help players receive bonuses, they can open a drug production and distribution facility when they have enough money. This will help the character’s ability to make money greatly increased.

title: Secret Agent Clank
description: In the action-packed plot of Secret Agent Clank, the protagonist is none other than Clank, the protagonist of the Ratchet & Clank video game series. After Ratchet gets arrested, it is up to Clank, in his role as the Secret Agent, to free him and save the entire world while he is at it! It is possible to play as Ratchet while locked up in prison and engage in combat with all his most dangerous foes. The pompous series hero, Qwark, attempts to get in on the action and follows Clank, seeking credit for his successes. You get to take on the role of Qwark and assist him in finishing his fantastical stories.

title: Shin Megami Tensei – Persona 3 Portable
description: This version of Shin Megami Tensei: Persona 3 for the PSP is an upgraded remake of the original game.
