The option to play as a female protagonist has been introduced, along with various alternate social links and minor story adjustments. These additions come on top of the numerous fighting system improvements that incorporate features from Shin Megami Tensei: Persona 4, which have already been included. The game also includes several new characters and cameo appearances, additional difficulty settings, and additions to the soundtrack. Unfortunately, most of the bonus content added in Shin Megami Tensei: Persona 3 FES is not included in this version of the game.

title: Shrek the Third
description: Shrek ascended to the kingdom after the death of the Frog King. Despite his dislike for the concept, Shrek and his companions travel to the Worcestershire Academy to recruit Fiona’s cousin, Artie, for the job. Unfortunately, Prince Charming has grand plans to take over the kingdom while abroad.

title: Silent Hill Origins
description: A prequel to the Silent Hill series, Silent Hill: Origins is a game in the 1970s. When you play the game, you take on the role of Travis Grady, a truck driver who, late one night, is attempting to make up time by taking a shortcut through Silent Hill.

title: Silent Hill – Shattered Memories
description: In Shattered Memories, you play the role of Harry Mason, who is looking for his daughter Cheryl around the eerie village of Silent Hill. The game is billed as a re-imagining of the first Silent Hill game and casts you in that role. The game does not include any weapons, so Harry has no choice except to flee for his life when the monsters appear. This new element to the franchise represents the demonic alternate realm of Silent Hill as a world of ice.

title: Sonic Rivals 2
description: The gameplay of Sonic Rivals 2 is similar to the original game, which consisted of racing another character to the finish line of each stage in a platforming world rendered in three dimensions. The characters can still pick up various power-ups scattered over the scene to strengthen their attacks against their opponent. You also face the same challenge as your opponent in the Boss stages: you must defeat the Boss before they do. Players will continue to acquire cards even after completing a variety of tasks.

title: SoulCalibur – Broken Destiny
description: The fighting game Soulcalibur: Broken Destiny is exclusive to the PlayStation Portable and borrows heavily from its predecessor, Soulcalibur IV. Kratos, a character from Sony’s God of War, and Dampierre are the newest additions to the 3D fighting game’s roster of playable characters.

title: Spider-Man 2
description: The gameplay of Sonic Rivals 2 is similar to the original game, which consisted of racing another character to the finish line of each stage in a platforming world rendered in three dimensions. The characters can still pick up various power-ups scattered over the stage to strengthen their attacks against their opponent. You also face the same challenge as your opponent in the Boss stages: you must defeat the Boss before they do. Players will continue to acquire cards even after completing a variety of tasks.

title: Spider-Man 3
description: After Norman Osborn was killed, Harry and Peter Parker’s friendship did not remain the same as in the past. He never stops holding Peter responsible for the death of his father. During this period, the Symbiote also crashed into Earth and began looking for its host there. Back to the life of a reporter whose colleagues lost their jobs due to Spider-Brock’s investigation into whether or not his photographs were authentic. Due to the Symbiote’s influence, Spider-Man could smash Brock’s camera while he was taking the actual pictures. As a result of this, Brock has vowed to have his revenge on Spider-Man. Upon realizing that items parasites in your body are harmful influences, Peter Parker tried his best to get rid of them, but unfortunately, it fell on the people Brock, and then he turned into Venom. Peter Parker tried his best to eliminate it, but it fell on the people Brock.

title: Spider-Man – Friend or Foe
description: Peter Parker, a high school student in a visit genetics lab with Hary Osborn and Little Jane Waston. There, Peter unexpectedly suffered a mutant ‘super spider’ gene. The next morning, after he woke up, Peter taught him no longer nearsightedness and his body had deteriorated, his muscles became even more pronounced. What is more strange is that his body is able to create networks and reflexes become faster and faster, so that he can completely avoid attacks when confronted with his classmate. Flash Thompon not only does Peter, but he also discovered that he has developed with super speed and strength, along with the ability to sticky on the face and the ability to sense danger is also enhanced. The greater the power, the greater the responsibility, knowing this Peter with supernatural power always helps people in difficult circumstances. It is also his mission to stand up to fight against the evil forces.On the way of fighting against the evil, he accompanies a lot of new friends, from here the new life of Spider-Man is captured.

title: Spider-Man – Web of Shadows
description:
Start the game with Spider-Man in an investigation about Mary Jane Watson. After finding the heroine with Luke Cage, he was attacked by a mysterious character. Spider-Man and Luke Cage hunted down city gang leaders, Roared Sevens and Park Avenue. He discovered high-tech assassins on top of buildings after defeating them and goodbye Cage to learn about the gangs. On a trail to Kingpin, he met the Black Cat – who was working with Kingpin. After that, he received coordination and joined forces with Moon Knight to prevent Kingpin’s illegal activities. Along with Wolverine, Spider-Man discovered Venom, who infected the civilian symbiote. Unfortunately, Black Cat was also one of the symbiote-controlled victims. The ultimate result has caused a great battle …
Spider-Man Web of Shadows is a third-person perspective video game. Players can fight not only on the ground but also on the walls of buildings and in the air; fighting on the wall is possible because the game includes enemies, like Spider-Man, who can walk on the wall, while aerial combat is caused by flying enemies, you only fight by using a new kind of attack is called “spider silk shooting”.This technique can be used as an attack and vehicle because Spider-Man attaches a silk net to the nearest enemy and pulls himself into the corresponding enemy; Spider-Man can hit enemies or jump over him when he is very close to him, as some enemies can resist silk attacks and hit characters when he touches them.As the story progresses, players also have the ability to summon various allies (Luke Cage, Moon Knight and Wolverine) to assist them in battles.Moreover, some villains like Black Cat, Vulture, Rhino and Electro are also among them, with the aim of enhancing the experience and the level of customization of this product overall.However, success or not depends on the “reputation bar” attribute accumulated during the journey.In addition, players can switch between the traditional red and blue costumes of Spider-Man and the black Symbiote suit at any time.Both are available with the upgrade and of course, the capabilities and statistics will evolve in a separate direction; Upgrade points earned from defeating enemies or completing specific missions and used to buy new battle moves for each suit.

title: Star Ocean – Second Evolution
description: Star Ocean: Second Evolution is a remastered version of the Playstation 1 role-playing game Star Ocean: The Second Story for the PSP. The plot and storyline remain the same, but many aspects have been improved or completely recreated.

title: Star Wars The Clone Wars – Republic Heroes
description: If you are a long-time fan of Star Wars then you will definitely love the story and context of Star Wars The Clone Wars – Republic Heroes. This version has almost kept the plot and the setting are also very relevant. With a huge number of characters, players can choose to play the role of stars like Anakin Skywalker, Obi-Wan Kenobi or Padawan Ahsoka Tano, even less popular ones like Jedi Plo Koon or Luminara Unduli. The gameplay is still similar to other Lego games, go through battle levels, jump from platform to platform and collect glowing stars to earn extra points. In each mission, it is necessary to use weapons (usually laser guns) to shoot at a wave of enemies in order to eliminate them as quickly as possible. Although sometimes you will find some very odd transportation or silly simple puzzles. But do not worry because they do not appear too much and it is not the main cause of nuisance. Repeating meaningless tasks, solving similar puzzles from time to time is what makes players feel frustrated and boring.

title: Star Wars – Battlefront II
description: A second serving of Battlefront delivers the same multiplayer fun with a dash of spice and a slew of additional content.

title: Street Fighter Alpha 3 MAX
description: The 2D arcade combatant Street Combatant Alpha 3 has been adapted into the 3D format for the Street Fighter Alpha 3 MAX. With a roster of 37 characters, three of which (Maki, Yun, and Eagle) have never been seen outside of the GBA edition, and one character who is brand-new to the game (Ingrid), you will be able to spend a very long time learning the complexities of all of the fighters.

title: Syphon Filter – Logan’s Shadow
description: In Logan’s Shadow, the second incarnation of the long-running Syphon Filter series available for the PSP, Gabe Logan finds himself in the fight of his life as he confronts the prospect that his long-time friend and ally, Lian Xing, could be a double agent. Logan’s Shadow follows Gabe Logan as he battles to save his life.

title: Syphon Filter: Dark Mirror
description: In the fifth episode of the Syphon Filter series, you take on the role of numerous characters, including Gabe Logan. These characters and Gabe Logan are all agents of the government agency Precision Strike. The game’s single-player story mode is incompatible with the typical Rambo techniques players use. To aid in uncovering the Dark Mirror project, which poses a grave risk to the safety of the entire world, you will need to combine stealth with the use of cutting-edge weapons and close-quarters warfare. Additionally, the game allows you to play through each task again to obtain unique bonus content. The online multiplayer aspect of the game enables players to compete in various tournaments, including team and free-for-all deathmatches, as well as two other types of co-op games.

title: Tales of the World – Radiant Mythology
description: The world of Teresia is attacked by someone capable of absorbing all energy and making them lose all their power. Although the inhabitants of this planet are unaware, this is actually the result of the actions of two entities named Widderhin and Aurora – descendants of the other world. In an attempt to solve this problem, the Tree of Life used the last source of power to create a guardian who was the protagonist of the game. The hero was awakened by a strange creature called Mormo – whose planet has also been destroyed by the same problem. He rescued a girl who was being attacked by a bunch of soldiers. This person introduces himself as a member of the Ad Libitum organization dedicated to helping people around the world fight injustice and oppression. The two decided to join this organization in hopes of finding the location of the power sucker.

title: Tekken 6
description: The long-running series of fighting games is now up to its sixth iteration with this game. Jin Kazama started to evolve into a tyrant after he won the most recent King of Iron Fist tournament and took control of Mishima Zaibatsu. He builds Mishima Zaibatsu into a superpower, severs all relations with other nations, and goes to war with them. In an effort to end this conflict, Lars Alexandersson, a Tekken Force soldier, instigates a rebellion, ultimately resulting in the Mishima Zaibatsu’s demise.

title: Tekken – Dark Resurrection
description: Tekken 5 has been improved for its re-release as Tekken: Dark Resurrection. The enhanced version of the arcade game, sometimes known as Tekken 5: Dark Resurrection or Tekken 5.2, inspires this product.

title: Tenchu – Shadow Assassins
description:
The context of the land of Gohda is in a state of instability when the world forces here are plotting to betray the monarch. Wishing to restore peace and eliminate bad guys, Lord Gohda has his two powerful arms investigated: Rikimaru and Ayame. They were introduced as elite ninjas, who had gone through harsh training.
Thanks to the advanced graphics processing technology, the character’s movements and other elements in the environment are smoothly presented, contributing to the creation of realistic gameplay. Besides, the color effects are quite eye-catching, showing the fierce through the battle. The character integrates kicking techniques and conventional weapons. Besides, he mixes includes magic, with more diverse and powerful techniques. Typically, targets are concentrated in one location, so a direct attack poses many disadvantages, which can cause the HP to be uncontrollably dropped. However, if they created attacks with greater accuracy, or hit them from behind, then the chances of winning would be higher. Moreover, in the future, you can also collect weapons or energy supplements to improve your personal stats.

title: The 3rd Birthday
description: The third installment in the Parasite Eve video game series casts players in the role of Aya Brea, who is no longer a member of the New York Police Department but rather a member of CTI (Counter Twisted Organization), an organization that fights a new variety of foe known as Twisted that has suddenly appeared in the picture. In contrast to the previous two games, this one is played in 3D, has a constant background, and utilizes an over-the-shoulder camera. Overdrive is Aya’s new extraordinary power, which allows her to exert her will and influence over friendly, non-playable characters on the battlefield. It also enables her to transmit her soul to other allies on the battlefield.

title: The Godfather – Mob Wars
description: In 1936 Johnny Trapani – a member of the Corleone family was meeting his wife Safarina when their bakery exploded. He was later beaten and killed by members of the Barzini family. Trapani’s son, Aldo, after his father’s death, was comforted by Vito Corleone that when he was old enough and given the right opportunity, he could avenge for his father. In 1945 Vito recruited Aldo into his family, taught him how to fight and collect bail, and then sent him to see Paulie Gatto. Gatto was assigned to take revenge on a group of people who attacked a merchant’s daughter. Here Aldo had learned many things and was becoming a true gangster. Will he be able to avenge for his late father?

title: The King of Fighters Collection – The Orochi Saga
description: Emulated versions of the first five games in the King of Fighters series are included in The King of Fighters Collection: The Orochi Saga. These games are as follows:* The King of Fighters ’94 (Sega Genesis)

title: The Simpsons Game
description: Bart Simpson goes to a video game store and purchases the new ultra-violent Grand Theft Scratchy game, which his mother, Marge, swiftly confiscates. Suddenly, a video game instruction booklet appears in front of him. After reading the guidebook, the Simpson family members realize each has a unique superpower. However, playing with these catches the attention of the aliens Kang and Kodos, who plan to conquer Earth. Now, the unlikely superheroes must defend Springfield against an alien invasion and discover the actual cause for their newly gained talents and even their very existence.

title: The Sims 2
description: When a flash blinded you, you were riding down a dusty road leading to Strangetown. Your automobile collides with something sharp, your wheel pops out, and you notice smoke rising from the engine. You have no choice but to leave your car in the hands of Oscar, a Strangetown mechanic. Now that you’re stranded in town, it’s up to you to explore, talk to the locals, and immerse yourself in a magical realm.

title: The Sims 2 – Pets
description: Hope’s Peak Academy top academy – an elite school that only accepts talented students. Students who want to enroll in a school must have their own special skills. Makoto Naegi, one of the ten talented contestants who successfully signed up to the school, was recognized with the title of “Super High School-Level Luck”.Upon receiving the matriculation message, Naegi and her original (future) classmates are thrilled to have proven their ability to become excellent students at the academy officially. Admission was not long ago, they had to face Monokuma – the principal of the academy. With his conspiracy, he decided to kill an elite academy student and made the suspicious students close to each other. But not let that plot succeeds, Monokuma and his friends begin to search for clues about this haunt.

title: The Warriors
description: The Warriors recounts the career of a Coney Island street gang and is based on the 1979 film of the same name, which most of the original cast voiced. Beginning months before the film’s events, The Warriors expand and defend their Coney Island territory, demonstrating that they are powerful enough to join The Riffs’ network. They can get invited to an important gang meeting where the future of New York street crime will be decided if they have a citywide rep.

title: Tom Clancys Ghost Recon – Predator
description: Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon Predator is the latest game in a popular series. In this game, you play as a member of the “Ghosts” squad and participate in military operations with other soldiers. The game was made by Ubisoft Studio, which had also made several other games in the series.

title: Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell – Essentials
description: Splinter Cell Essentials is a hand-held “sequel” to Splinter Cell: Double Agent. The game features a story that explains the events after Double Agent and revisits previous missions from the original game. Additionally, the game features flashback missions of his Navy SEAL days, levels made exclusively for the PSP, such as a mission in the jungle of Columbia in 1992. There are a total of nine missions to play through in the main modes, and there are also three bonus missions that may be unlocked.

title: Tomb Raider – Anniversary
description: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: Anniversary is a graphical recreation of the original Tomb Raider with a more sophisticated graphics engine. It follows the same core plot, albeit with certain cutscenes, and most of the dialogue has been enlarged or changed differently. Locations are the same as in the original version and are accessed in the same order, but have been redesigned with different layouts and mostly completely different puzzles that allow for the implementation of new moves introduced in Lara Croft Tomb Raider: Legend: swinging on Ropes and using a grappling hook at specific points.

title: Tomb Raider – Legend
description: Legend is the seventh main game in the Tomb Raider series, produced for the first time by Crystal Dynamics in collaboration with Toby Gard, the original character designer of the game’s protagonist Lara Croft.

title: Tony Hawk’s Project 8
description: It just so happens that The Birdman, searching for the best top skaters for his new project, has stopped in your city to hunt for some. To be considered one of the finest top skaters, you must participate in Tony Hawk’s Project 8. It is up to you to demonstrate that you can make the other two hundred individuals who are compe the coveted eight seats. You begin the game ranked 200th, and around the city, there are a variety of objectives and goals established for you to complete. One of these objectives is reintroducing the classic mode from the earlier Tony Hawk games.

title: Tony Hawk’s Underground 2 – Remix
description: Tony Hawk’s Underground 2: Remix includes all of the aspects from Tony Hawk’s Underground 2 and four new cities, all of which can be played on your PSP.

title: Toy Story 3
description: Andy went to a university and no longer used toys for years so they decided to catch his attention by using the phone. But the plan failed. Andy took the phone from Rex’s hand and closed the toy box. He decided to take Woody to college with him and put the rest of his toys in his pocket and plan to put them in the trash. Luckily, they managed to get out of the bag and escape to the garage. Buzz decided that they should go to Sunnyside Daycare to be played again. Woody is stuck in a tree and taken home by a girl named Bonnie. The toys are about to be taken to the incinerator but fortunately saved and they decided to return to Andy’s home. Woody decided that they should go to Bonnie’s house. He changed the words on the toy box, so they were taken to Bonnie and returned to playing days.

title: Transformers – Revenge of the Fallen
description: Currently, two years after the Battle of Mission City, Autobots and the US military have established the Treaty of Alien Species Earth (NEST), an international task force classified to eliminate surviving Decepticons. However, they discovered that Megatron’s corpse lay at the bottom of the Laurentian Abyss and the last AllSpark fragment remained on Earth. That means the Decepticons are still on Earth and hunting Autobots. Sam Witwicky, meanwhile, was preparing to go to college, stumbling across a smaller piece of AllSpark. The fragment that affected Sam’s mind made him see the Cybertronian symbols and revive the electronics, attacking Sam and his family. But then these devices were killed by Bumblebee. Since then Sam has been caught in a whirlwind of war between Autobots and their enemies plotting to destroy the Earth.

title: Transformers – The Game
description: Transformers: The Game is a version of the American film super-production Transformers: Dark of the Moon, made by Activision in 2007 and was based on the Transformers universe license. Even though the product uses the movie script a lot, it also gives us freedom, especially when picking robots and destroying the environment.

title: UEFA Champions League 2006-2007
description: A football (soccer) video game developed by Electronic Arts and utilizing a license from UEFA. This game’s primary objective is to recreate the feel of the 2006-2007 UEFA Champions League competition, which it was designed to coincide with and was published to coincide with.

title: UFC 2010 Undisputed
description: The PlayStation Portable (PSP) and the PlayStation Vita consoles can be used.

title: Undead Knights
description: Undead Knights is a story that takes place in the medieval ages and tells the tale of a puppet king, his strange queen, and a treacherous betrayal. In response to Romulus’s suspicions regarding the queen’s allegiance, the monarch gave the order to have all of Romulus’s family members put to death by his soldiers.

title: Valkyrie Profile – Lenneth
description: The video game Valkyrie Profile was first developed for the PlayStation console and has been ported over to the PSP as Valkyrie Profile: Lenneth. Because it is based on the original Japanese version, it does not have any of the enhancements in the English version, such as the animation of Lezard’s tower. Full-motion video sequences, which either replaced or supplemented the previous semi-drafted tale scenes, are a new feature in this version.

title: Virtua Tennis 3
description: You’ll face off against 20 of the biggest names in tennis, including Maria Sharapova, Roger Federer, and Lindsay Davenport, among others, in the World Tour mode of Virtua Tennis 3, the most meaningful way. You are responsible for creating your character and playing the game to top the global leaderboard.

title: WALL-E
description: Set in 2805, when the Earth was severely devastated, everywhere was filled with garbage. Humans make an evacuation, leave the Earth deserted. WALL-E – a robot handles the trash – was left behind after the removal, he is still working. One day, Wall – E comes across robots EVE and falls in love; he decides to follow her adventure in space. WALL – E is an adventure game; players will transform into the cute WALL – E guy to experience on new lands. The character shape is still 100% identical to the original movie, now WALL – E is equipped with a laser gun to kill some enemies along the way, do focus and overcome them. There are many levels, corresponding to each level is a different planet, but they will be locked. A new map will unlock when the player passes the previous mission. Using a laser to destroy the supply boxes along the way to collect energy pellets, helps to upgrade WALL – E both in speed and power.

title: WWE All-Stars
description: World wrestlers always extremely fierce and full of difficulties and challenges. Not everyone has the courage and talent to stand on a professional wrestling ring. The bloody fight is a specialty of WWE. There have been many people who were injured or even disabled by their opponents: such difficulties but equally great glory. The world championship is the dream of all wrestlers. They have gathered here to compete for this title. Will you be brave enough to fight, or far from being capable of being the greatest wrestler?

title: WWE SmackDown vs. RAW 2011
description: Daniel Bryan from the days when he was still just an unknown in the gym, buried his head into the series of non-stop training days with Shawn Michaels. His life was not a smooth one, but he met many events in his life, from the failures in the arena to the dismissal from the company. Despite the bad things that happened constantly, Daniel did not give up but continued to pursue the dream of professional wrestling. He gradually proved his ability and became a Superstar, creating a solid name in the professional wrestling village.

title: WWE SmackDown! vs. RAW 2006
description: This episode of the Smackdown series continues the Smackdown vs. Raw era, which now incorporates an annual date into its title in a manner comparable to that of other sports titles.

title: WWE SmackDown! vs. RAW 2007
description: The third chapter of the WWE SmackDown vs. Raw series is titled WWE SmackDown vs. Raw 2007, released in 2007. The roster has been revised to accommodate new wrestlers for the season, which is consistent with the majority of the previous episodes in this series. This game also has a whole new Analog Control Grappling System, which helps the combat feel more realistic by allowing for more exact movement and control components. An improved version of the Season Mode features many narratives that can branch off in different directions, numerous degrees of player choice, and over a dozen environmental hotspots.

title: WWE Smackdown vs. Raw 2010
description:
WWE Smackdown vs.Raw 2010 is a professional wrestling game, developed based on a popular and popular WWE sport in the world. However, instead of making matches that were scripted, this game was more realistic and violent. As one of the WWE squad members or an anonymous character created in Super Star mode, you will have to defeat all other opponents to claim the championship. With open and free play, the goal for each stage is just draining the wrestlers’ health watches on the ring, to get the key to the next round. However, if you feel constrained, join Story Designer, to write your own story.
If you want to conquer and fight more, Road to Wrestlemania is a great challenge to seize. In it, the participation of more than 50 excellent warriors, including the champions of previous years. But in my opinion, choose one of 67 available characters, instead of creating new. For example Seth Rollins, Roman Reigns, or Braun Strowman. Each of them has good fighting techniques, and it would be even better if you could string them into combos.

title: Warriors Orochi
description: Warriors Orochi is a hybrid of Koei’s Dynasty Warriors and Samurai Warriors series. Orochi, the Serpent King, has created a time gap and gathered the most formidable warriors from Japan’s Sengoku period and China’s Three Kingdoms era for a battle for the ages.

title: Warrios Orochi 2
description: After the king Yamata no Orochi died. But one thing no one expected that Da Ji escaped successfully. She escaped and somehow reached the Heiki period to start the Taira Samurai ancestor is Kiyomori. He rose again, but in a state of half-human and half devil, because he had been exiled by Da Ji on his body, and “brainwashed” to make him become cult by the power of Orochi. Later, both of them tried their best to revive for the Sultan. They had to deal with the pursuing of four powerful forces: Samurai, Shu, Wei, Wu Dynasty and decided to split up to take action. In order to prevent the attacks from the forces and the alliance, Kiyomori has summoned Sun Wukong together with two new monsters: Gyuki, Dodomeki and sealed the seals to Sun Wukong. After winning, Sun Wukong decided to stay by? Side because she felt free. While Da Ji finds and protects Himiko – a magician with the ability to revive Orochi.

title: Wipeout Pulse
description: WipEout Pulse, like the other titles in the series, is a futuristic racing game in which players control a hovercraft-like vehicle that hovers above the ground and can achieve extremely high speeds. The game takes place in 2207, and players compete in the FX400 Anti-Gravity Racing League, which has tracks worldwide.

title: Wipeout Pure
description: WipEout Pure is the first PSP rendition of the popular Wipeout series. Players compete in the FX300 Racing League, a futuristic racing league in which they operate fast hovercrafts on tight, twisting tracks, fighting for first place in one of many tournaments. There are 10 anti-gravity vehicles to choose from (two must be unlocked), each with unique speed, handling, and acceleration qualities. Vehicles are further classified, which are gradually opened. Most cars in later classes get significantly quicker and require more precision steering at high speeds. Similarly, players might get access to new events.

title: X-Men Legends II – Rise of Apocalypse
description: Since a shared foe, the terrifying Apocalypse has materialized, the Brotherhood and the X-Men mutants are trying to put their differences aside and work together. His objective is to capture mutants, then, with the assistance of the crazed geneticist Mr. Sinister, remove their abilities and exploit them to make himself even more powerful. He will do this by using the mutants as guinea pigs. The priority for the heroes is to free Professor X from the grasp of their adversaries, who have captured him. However, after Apocalypse kidnaps Magneto’s son Quicksilver, the leader of the Brotherhood is more determined than ever to team up with his erstwhile enemies and foil Apocalypse’s nefarious ambitions. Apocalypse kidnaped Quicksilver.

title: X-Men Origins – Wolverine
description: Unleash the razor-sharp adamantium claws, savage instincts, and mutant regeneration skills of the world’s deadliest Super Hero – Wolverine – and uncage the narrative of how the ultimate weapon was developed. The crew at Raven Software has focused the “Uncaged Edition” on unstoppable and true-to-character accuracy. This edition is an experience that is only available on the Xbox 360, PlayStation 3, and Games for Windows platforms:

title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX Tag Force
description: The first Yu-Gi-Oh! Video game to being released on the PlayStation Portable (PSP), Yu-Gi-Oh! Players will be transported back to the Duel Academy in G.X., where they will reside alongside students from the Ra Yellow and Obelisk Blue schools in the Slifer Red dorm. Duel Academy has decided to organize a different student competition during the current academic year. They will now be able to fight in teams of two. Players can gain benefits such as access to the abundant Duel Academy Isle for an entire day, but those incentives depend on who their partners are.

title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX Tag Force 2
description: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX Tag Force 2 brings the Yu-Gi-Oh! Phenomenon back to the PSP with new features sure to please the fans because it was the people who recommended those features in the first place. The option to compete in four-player Tag Duels is this game’s most significant new element, which is again based on the immensely famous GX TV Series.

title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX Tag Force 3
description:
10 years after Yugi Mutou’s journey, the Duel Monster game has become extremely popular in life, the players grow like mushrooms, and their skills are also much higher. The young Jaden Yuki, on his way to the school of Duel Academy player training, met the game king Yugi Mutou and received the Winged Kuriboh card. At school, he met Syrus Truesdale, Chumley Huffington, his mortal enemy Chazz Princeton and an extremely mysterious person named Zane Truesdale. At there, he had an exciting card game, and it forged him the will never to give up. After graduating, the Winged Kuriboh card brings him back to the past to confront himself.
Yu-Gi-Oh!Gx Tag Force 3 is a magical card game in which it requires the player to have careful thought when deciding which card to play. This is the reason why this game attracts so many players. Every turn on the pitch needs a proper card instead of putting all the most reliable cards you have on the field. A quick introduction to this game, starting each game on both sides, will be given a certain amount of points. These points will be lost when monsters or enemy spells to attack. When one side has a zero score, the game ends with the other team winning. The only downside this game encounters is the game’s AI is complicated. Although not to the extent that it can counterattack all your moves, it is a tough challenge, and if you are a beginner to play Yu-Gi-Oh, you may need to consider before challenging yourself to this game. There is also an audience feature that allows you to test your opponent’s deck so you can research your strategy before starting a match. Players can also participate in mini-games, which are not part of the storyline. Do not worry if you feel that your deck is not strong enough because, after each game, the reward for the winner will be new cards to increase the strength of your deck.
